Quality Education.reason: The course is fundamentally about higher education, aiming to 'integrate their mathematical knowledge' and 'deepen their foundational theories and practical application skills' for university students.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course focuses on developing 'innovative problem-solving skills' and using mathematical models to 'solve practical problems', which are core components of scientific research and innovation.
